#summary How to build jSCEP
#labels Phase-Implementation

jSCEP uses Apache Maven to manage its build process.

= Download the Source =

{{{
svn checkout http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ jscep-read-only
cd jscep-read-only
}}}

= Build Package =

{{{
mvn clean install
mvn package
}}}

= Build Source Package =

{{{
mvn source:jar
}}}

= Build Javadoc Package =

{{{
mvn javadoc:jar
}}}
